data.css: .flow {     height: 120px;     background: linear-gradient(to right, red, orange, yellow, green, cyan, blue,  purple);     -webkit-background-clip: text;     -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;     animation:  hue 3s linear infinite;     font-size: 100px;     padding: 20px; } @keyframes hue {     0% {         filter: hue-rotate(0deg);     }     100% {         filter: hue-rotate(360deg);     } }
data.name: css文字环绕
